sqlMap.select: SELECT seq, cust_name, cust_phone, to_char(cust_birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') as cust_birth, cont_term, to_char(open_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as open_date, memo, price_name, model_code FROM custominfo WHERE brc_id=#brc_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE custominfo SET cust_name = #cust_name#, cust_phone = #cust_phone#, cust_birth = #cust_birth#, cont_term = #cont_term#, open_date = #open_date#, price_name = #price_name#, model_code = #model_code#, memo = #memo# WHERE seq = #seq# AND brc_id = #brc_id#
